name: Tripes du Port
effect:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 900â€“1,500 HP.
description: An offal dish. Cut the ingredients into pieces, put them in a pot, seal with dough, and bake. This recipe originated in a harbor town. The story of the town has long been swallowed by the rising seas, but this delicacy yet survives in Fontaine.

suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.
suspicious.description: An offal dish. The texture of the cow's stomach is like wind-dried leather, and it is completely unchewable. Even worse is the strange flavor spreading throughout your mouth, it's like you've taken an "expired canned food" challenge... Just giving up might be your best option.

normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.
normal.description: An offal dish. Cut the ingredients into pieces, put them in a pot, seal with dough, and bake. This recipe originated in a harbor town. The story of the town has long been swallowed by the rising seas, but this delicacy yet survives in Fontaine.

delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.
delicious.description: An offal dish. The flaky yet soft cow's stomach has an almost fruity fragrance. Unlike other surprising delicacies that take the world by storm, the dish is overflowing with rich traditional savor, and once you have a single bite, you simply cannot stop!
